title: Crypto Birds
author: Crypto Birds
content: Optimize Your $XCB Performance   Use Your NFTs in SUPER STAKING by Crypto Birds Platform.In SUPER STAKING users will be able to use their “Crypto Birds User Levels NFTs” to get better +APRs.-------------------------------------More info & Tutorial  https://cryptobirds.medium.com/super-staking-more-apr-with-your-nfts-crypto-birds-platform-2ae355293baa-------------------------------------What is SUPER STAKING with User Level NFTs?At Crypto Birds we built the collaborate-to-earn model to reward user participation in the platform.SUPER STAKING with NFTs is a unique feature that uses DeFi and gamification to reward the mostparticipative users.We have developed a system where users can get different levels based on their participation, represented by NFTs.Use your Crypto Birds User Level NTFs to get a differential APR in SUPER STAKING.-------------------------------------Accelerate The Performance Of Your $XCB,Use Your NFTs in SUPER STAKE  https://cryptobirds.com/token/stake-------------------------------------SUPER STAKING Details:Pool Level 1 Total tokens: 200,000 XCB Rewards per block: 0.07605305918 XCB Distribution duration: 90 days. Termination: October 24, 2022Pool Level 2 Total tokens: 300,000 XCB Rewards per block: 0.1140795888 XCB Distribution duration: 90 days. Ending: October 24, 2022Pool Level 3 Total tokens: 400,000 XCB Rewards per block: 0, 0.1521061184 XCB Duration of distribution: 90 days. Termination: October 24, 2022Pool Level 4 Total tokens: 500,000 XCB Rewards per block: 0.1901326479 XCB Distribution duration: 90 days. End Date: October 24, 2022-------------------------------------Crypto Birds follow the whispering!Website: https://cryptobirds.com/Telegram Channel: https://t.me/cryptobirdsofficialTelegram Group: https://t.me/CryptoBirdsGroupTwitter: https://twitter.com/CryptoBirdsLinkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/cryptobirdsMedium: https://cryptobirds.medium.com/
